name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'アダルトスーツ' (Adult Suits) by Tokoyami Towa.
MC section where Tokoyami Towa greets the audience and celebrates her 6th anniversary.

subtitles.original: Can you hear me when I cry this desperation?
subtitles.english: Can you hear me when I cry this desperation?

subtitles.original: Nothing comes along with my expectation.
subtitles.english: Nothing comes along with my expectation.

subtitles.original: How much prayer echo feeling...
subtitles.english: How much prayer echo feeling...

subtitles.original: ...breathe in...
subtitles.english: ...breathe in...

subtitles.original: ...I got in this desperation.
subtitles.english: ...I got in this desperation.

subtitles.original: アダルトスーツ
subtitles.english: Adult Suits

subtitles.original: 作詞:Taka 作曲:Toru / Taka
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Taka  Composition: Toru / Taka

subtitles.original: アダルトな着ぐるみ着てる僕
subtitles.english: Me, wearing an adult costume

subtitles.original: 心はいつも 不安定天秤さ
subtitles.english: My heart is always an unstable scale

subtitles.original: まさかの発言で凍りつく
subtitles.english: Frozen by an unexpected remark

subtitles.original: 色めき隠れ 彷徨う僕
subtitles.english: Hiding my colors and wandering

subtitles.original: 今日今この瞬間にハッとする
subtitles.english: Suddenly struck by this moment today

subtitles.original: 言葉がいつも後ろ髪引く
subtitles.english: Words always pull me back

subtitles.original: 全部ダメダメ なんて事じゃもう 放っておいて
subtitles.english: If everything is bad, just leave me alone

subtitles.original: 端からなかった事にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's act like it never happened from the start

subtitles.original: それじゃダメダメ 悪い癖だね もう知らない
subtitles.english: That's no good. It's a bad habit. I don't care anymore

subtitles.original: どうせ期待されているなら
subtitles.english: If I'm being expected of anyway

subtitles.original: キミキミでいこう
subtitles.english: Let's go as you are

subtitles.original: 何もかもが暗く黒く見える
subtitles.english: Everything looks dark and black

subtitles.original: 色眼鏡付きのアダルトなバッタもんスーツ
subtitles.english: An adult knock-off suit with tinted glasses

subtitles.original: 必殺技かける 0 で全部 消し去ろうか
subtitles.english: Should I use my special move and erase it all to zero?

subtitles.original: 強気な僕
subtitles.english: Me, being assertive

subtitles.original: だけど実際は やっぱできやしないの
subtitles.english: But in reality, I still can't do it

subtitles.original: 身軽さを奪われ動けない
subtitles.english: Stripped of my agility, I can't move

subtitles.original: それでも愛言葉 バランスとれてるんだよ
subtitles.english: But even so, our code word keeps us in balance

subtitles.original: 君は耳元でそれを言う
subtitles.english: You whisper it in my ear

subtitles.original: それにしちゃ少し あんまりじゃない？ ってか不公平じゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't that a bit much? Or rather, isn't it unfair?

subtitles.original: どうせガチ目なんてないし
subtitles.english: It's not like there's any seriousness anyway

subtitles.original: 食い気味でいこう
subtitles.english: Let's jump right in

subtitles.original: I feel this moment. No one can take it.
subtitles.english: I feel this moment. No one can take it.

subtitles.original: 何万回だって 伝わらなきゃ意味ないないない
subtitles.english: No matter how many times, it's meaningless if it doesn't get across

subtitles.original: 今日今この瞬間が大事なの
subtitles.english: Today, this moment is what matters

subtitles.original: 奪う権利は あなたに手はない
subtitles.english: You have no right to take it away

subtitles.original: 全部ダメダメ 何がダメダメ なんでしょう
subtitles.english: Everything is bad? What is so bad about it?

subtitles.original: 納得いくまで話して
subtitles.english: Talk to me until I'm satisfied

subtitles.original: どうせ屁理屈 並べるんならバカみたい
subtitles.english: If you're just going to make excuses, it's idiotic

subtitles.original: とどめを刺す気でいるなら
subtitles.english: If you're planning to deliver the final blow

subtitles.original: 今がチャンスだぞ
subtitles.english: Now is your chance

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで！
subtitles.english: Hi! So!

subtitles.original: こんやっぴー！ホロライブ4期生の常闇トワ様でーす！
subtitles.english: Konyappi! It's Hololive 4th Gen's Tokoyami Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、なんと本日6周年を迎えました！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, believe it or not, today I've reached my 6th anniversary!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ろっ、ろく！
subtitles.english: Si-six!

subtitles.original: 悪魔の数字「6」！
subtitles.english: The devil's number '6'!

subtitles.original: ということで、今年はトワちゃんの年ということでいいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: So, can we say this year is Towa-chan's year?

subtitles.original: ま、よくないか。
subtitles.english: Well, maybe not.

subtitles.original: いいか！
subtitles.english: It's fine!

subtitles.original: ま、人によってはトワちゃんの、ね、あの年にしたっていいということで。
subtitles.english: Well, for some people, it's fine to make it Towa-chan's year.

subtitles.original: はい、よろしくお願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Yes, please lend me your support!
